benchmark_details.name: FunEq Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The FunEq dataset is a curated collection of functional equation problems formalized in Lean, spanning three difficulty levels (simple, intermediate, hard) for evaluating automated theorem provers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a rigorous benchmark for evaluating automated theorem provers in the domain of functional equations.

data.source: Manually curated collection of functional equation problems.

methodology.calculation: Performance is assessed using Pass@1 and Pass@2 metrics, representing success on the first and second attempts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@1 and Pass@2 scores indicate better performance of automated theorem provers on functional equation problems.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance benchmarks include COPRA and Few-Shots comparisons.
methodology.validation: Empirical validation through performance comparisons on the FunEq dataset.
